snippet.title: Horizon Journey - Anouncement Trailer
snippet.description:
Horizon Journey - Anouncement Trailer
Wishlist Now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1769960/Horizon_Journey/

Embark on an epic adventure to Mars in Horizon Journey, an open-world survival game that blends colonization, terraforming, and exploration in both single-player and multiplayer co-op modes. You're tasked with the monumental challenge of making Mars a new home for humanity.
